channel.title: Quick Error
channel.description:
[URL=http://img525.imageshack.us/i/errorz.png/][IMG]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/9794/errorz.png[/img][/URL]
RSCA error..
Can login the first time fine, then when I logout and log back in, I get this error in server.
-I've restarted server -I've restarted client -Server\Client are un-edited.

item.title: Quick Error
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

Yes, session hijacking is fixed @ the source released.

It was simple, a users session was purely hijacked (wasn’t checked if the session was initialized already or not)

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Error
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

Has the session hijacking issue been fixed in the source that was released?

Furthermore, can you explain how the session hijacking bug worked?

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Error
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

  if(world.getPlayer(player.getUsernameHash()) != null) {
      Exception e = new Exception("Double log from " + player.getUsername() + " | " + player.getUsernameHash()); 
      e.printStackTrace();
      loginCode = 5;
      player.destroy(true);
      player.getSession().close();
      world.unregisterPlayer(player);
      return;
   }

That part yes

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Error
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

public void handlePacket(rsca.gs.connection.Packet p, IoSession session) throws Exception { byte loginCode = p.readByte(); if(world.getPlayer(player.getUsernameHash()) != null) { Exception e = new Exception("Double log from " + player.getUsername() + " | " + player.getUsernameHash()); e.printStackTrace(); loginCode = 5; player.destroy(true); player.getSession().close(); world.unregisterPlayer(player); return; }
Toss this?

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Error
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

It was left in there from the session hijacking bug (we were looking for possible causes). Removing it should fix it.

Read full topic

Can login the first time fine, then when I logout and log back in, I get this error in server.

-I’ve restarted client
